com.fluidops.iwb.api.editor
Class TripleEditorSourceURIImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.fluidops.iwb.api.editor.TripleEditorSourceLoadAtOnceBase<org.openrdf.model.URI>
      com.fluidops.iwb.api.editor.TripleEditorSourceURIImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
TripleEditorSource, TripleEditorSourceURI
public class TripleEditorSourceURIImpl
extends TripleEditorSourceLoadAtOnceBase<org.openrdf.model.URI>
implements TripleEditorSourceURI

Triple editor source for URI resources which retrieves the outgoing and optionally the incoming statements. This triple source retrieves all statements at once and performs clustering according to the domain (or range) or the given property.

Author:
as (cp) (msc)

Description copied from interface: TripleEditorSourceURI
Initialize a URI triple editor source. Must be called prior to accessing any internal data.
